name: David Weiss
biography:
Swiss artists Peter Fischli and David Weiss have collaborated on kinetic installations since 1979. Their exhibitions include: Fischli/Weiss: Unsettled Work, Kestner Gesellschaft, Hannover; 50th Venice Biennale
(2003); Museum Boijmans Van Beuningen Rotterdam, The Netherlands (2003); Fragen Projektion, Museum Ludwig, Cologne (2002); Fischli & Weiss. Mundo visivel, Museu de Arte Contempor√¢nea de Serralves, Porto, Portugal (2001); Sicht Bare Welt (Visible World), Yokohama Triennale, Yokohama, Japan (2001); ARC 1999, Musee d'Art Moderne de la Ville de Paris, Paris, France (1999); Freie Sicht aufs Mittelmeer, Junge Scheizer Kunst mit Gasten und Galtmahl, Kunsthaus Zurich (1998); Eight People from Europe, Museum of Modern Art, Gumma, Japan (1998); Gwangju Biennale, Gwangju, Korea (1997); Documenta X, Kassel, Germany (1997); and Peter Fischli and David Weiss: In a Restless World, San Francisco Museum of Modern Art, San Francisco (1996).
